type.name: section
type.title: No sale of balata without a licence.
type.context: BALATA ACT under No sale of balata without a licence. 3. (1) No one shall sell or export balata unless he takes out a licence for so doing.  (2) The licence shall not be issued to anyone unless  (a)   he is the holder of a licence for obtaining balata, issued under  the State Lands Regulations for the time being in force;  (b)    he satisfies a district commissioner that he is the owner or lawful occupier of land on which bullet trees are growing; or  (c)   he is the duly authorised agent of the persons aforesaid.  (3) A district commissioner shall not be bound to issue any licence under this section.

type.name: section
type.title: Licensees to keep books.
type.context: BALATA ACT under Licensees to keep books. 5. (1) Everyone licensed to sell, export, or purchase balata shall, keep a book in which shall be entered  (a)    the name and address of the person to whom he sells, or from whom he purchases it, or for whom as agent he sells or exports it;  LAWS OF GUYANA Balata Cap. 69:07 5  L.R.O. 1/2012                             Licence issued to owner of private land to specify quantity of balata to be sold under it.   [6 of 1997]               (b) the quantity of balata so sold, purchased, or exported;   (c) the price at which it was sold and purchased;  (d)  the date of the sale, purchase, or export; and  (e)  if he is the seller or exporter thereof, the place from which it was obtained.   (2) The book shall be open at all reasonable times to the inspection of any officer.  (3)  Anyone licensed as aforesaid who neglects to keep the book, or duly to enter therein the particulars hereinbefore required, or who refuses to allow it to be inspected by an officer, shall be liable on summary conviction to a fine of nineteen thousand five hundred dollars.

type.context: BALATA ACT under Licence issued to owner of private land to specify quantity of balata to be sold under it. 6. type.name: section
type.title: (1) Issue of licences. (3) Penalty for selling without.
type.context: BALATA ACT under (1) Issue of licences. (3) Penalty for selling without. 7. (1) Licences to sell, export, or purchase balata may be issued by the district commissioner.  (2) A licence shall expire on the 31st March next after its issue, and the person to whom it is issued shall pay for it the sum fixed by the Tax Act for the time being in force.  (3) Everyone who sells, exports, or purchases balata without having a licence in force for so doing under this Act shall be liable on summary conviction to a fine of forty-eight thousand seven hundred and fifty dollars.

description.description: Licences to sell, export, or purchase balata may be issued by the district commissioner.

type.name: section

type.context: BALATA ACT under Imported balata excepted from Act. 8. This Act shall not apply to any balata imported into Guyana from any country or place outside Guyana.
